name: BoulderCrest
description:
"I eat fear for breakfast!"

Batto and his Uncle were on a casual camping trip in the forest. When suddenly things take a turn for the worst. The evil creature rumored to be making the forest a nightmare has closed in on Batto and snatched his Golden Apple and defeated his Uncle. Its up to you to get it back!

BoulderCrest is true to its platforming roots and features exciting elements to always keep the player on their toes!

In this game you will find:

  • Jump through many different obstacles scattered around the forest in there evil attempt to stop all that enter.
  • Fight using many different attacks like a strong bat swing ,fireballs or even a spin attack to defeat and knockout anybody who stays in your way.
  • Collect Ladybugs and Red Apples all throughout the forest! Gather 80 ladybugs to get one Red Apple! Perfect for keeping Batto Alive
  • Chat with forest animals and gain helpful information about where you are and what to look out for!

Can you make it through BoulderCrest's 3 levels and defeat the evil villian at the end? 

Put your courage to the test right here!

CONTROLS

  • J - Weak Attack/Select
  • K - Strong Attack/ Spin Attack if in air. Tip: Use this as a double jump and even repeatedly press K for extra air time
  • L - Shoot fireballs
  • ESC - To pause
  • W - Chat & Progress Dialogue
  • N - Dodge
  • M - Eat Apples/Heal
